title: Apple’s ‘Peek Performance’ event was packed with new products – what’s your favorite?
content:
Yesterday, Apple held its first event of the year. Called “Peek Performance,” the company introduced new colors of the iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 Pro, a new 5G iPhone SE, the last M1 chip called the M1 Ultra, unveiled a new iPad Air as well as the Mac Studio and Studio Display. From all of these announcements, which one was your favorite?

more…

The post Apple’s ‘Peek Performance’ event was packed with new products – what’s your favorite? appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple held its "Peek Performance" event yesterday. From all of the announcements, which one was your favorite?
